name: Barack Obama
title: 44th President of the United States
summary: Barack Obama is known for his eloquent oratory with a distinctive cadence, frequent thoughtful pauses, and an inspirational tone that builds throughout his speeches.
bio: Barack Hussein Obama II is an American politician, attorney, and author who served as the 44th president of the United States from 2009 to 2017. A member of the Democratic Party, he was the first African-American president of the United States.
voiceCharacteristics: Dynamic range from conversational to inspirational

samples.title: Yes We Can
samples.fullText: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
tips: Focus on his distinctive pauses between phrases
Note how he builds rhythm through repetition
Pay attention to the rise and fall of his tone
